title: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Enhancement Program for Online/Hybrid PBL Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic teaching methods and awareness of PBL (Project-Based Learning) concepts
context.additional_context: Prospective teachers require practical skills to design and implement PBL classes in social studies, with a need for flexible learning environments utilizing personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can apply a PBL instructional design framework in online/hybrid environments
Learners author PBL scenarios using web-based tools and manage implementation processes
Learners can design a PBL (Project-Based Learning) assessment system specialized in social studies subjects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
